title: QSAR biodegradation
description: The QSAR biodegradation dataset was built in the Milano Chemometrics and QSAR Research Group (Universit�� degli Studi Milano ��� Bicocca, Milano, Italy). The research leading to these results has received funding from the European Community�۪s Seventh Framework Programme [FP7/2007-2013] under Grant Agreement n. 238701 of Marie Curie ITN Environmental Chemoinformatics (ECO) project. The data have been used to develop QSAR (Quantitative Structure Activity Relationships) models for the study of the relationships between chemical structure and biodegradation of molecules. Biodegradation experimental values of 1055 chemicals were collected from the webpage of the National Institute of Technology and Evaluation of Japan (NITE). Classification models were developed in order to discriminate ready (356) and not ready (699) biodegradable molecules by means of three different modelling methods: k Nearest Neighbours, Partial Least Squares Discriminant Analysis and Support Vector Machines. Details on attributes (molecular descriptors) selected in each model can be found in the quoted reference: Mansouri, K., Ringsted, T., Ballabio, D., Todeschini, R., Consonni, V. (2013). Quantitative Structure - Activity Relationship models for ready biodegradability of chemicals. Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling, 53, 867-878.

features.name: V1
features.description: SpMax_L: Leading eigenvalue from Laplace matrix

features.name: V2
features.description: J_Dz(e): Balaban-like index from Barysz matrix weighted by Sanderson electronegativity

features.name: V3
features.description: nHM: Number of heavy atoms

features.name: V4
features.description: F01[N-N]: Frequency of N-N at topological distance 1

features.name: V5
features.description: F04[C-N]: Frequency of C-N at topological distance 4

features.name: V6
features.description: NssssC: Number of atoms of type ssssC

features.name: V7
features.description: nCb-: Number of substituted benzene C(sp2)

features.name: V8
features.description: C%: Percentage of C atoms

features.name: V9
features.description: nCp: Number of terminal primary C(sp3)

features.name: V10
features.description: nO: Number of oxygen atoms

features.name: V11
features.description: F03[C-N]: Frequency of C-N at topological distance 3

features.name: V12
features.description: SdssC: Sum of dssC E-states

features.name: V13
features.description: HyWi_B(m): Hyper-Wiener-like index (log function) from Burden matrix weighted by mass

features.name: V14
features.description: LOC: Lopping centric index

features.name: V15
features.description: SM6_L: Spectral moment of order 6 from Laplace matrix

features.name: V16
features.description: F03[C-O]: Frequency of C - O at topological distance 3

features.name: V17
features.description: Me: Mean atomic Sanderson electronegativity (scaled on Carbon atom)

features.name: V18
features.description: Mi: Mean first ionization potential (scaled on Carbon atom)

features.name: V19
features.description: nN-N: Number of N hydrazines

features.name: V20
features.description: nArNO2: Number of nitro groups (aromatic)

features.name: V21
features.description: nCRX3: Number of CRX3

features.name: V22
features.description: SpPosA_B(p): Normalized spectral positive sum from Burden matrix weighted by polarizability

features.name: V23
features.description: nCIR: Number of circuits

features.name: V24
features.description: B01[C-Br]: Presence/absence of C - Br at topological distance 1

features.name: V25
features.description: B03[C-Cl]: Presence/absence of C - Cl at topological distance 3

features.name: V26
features.description: N-073: Ar2NH / Ar3N / Ar2N-Al / R..N..R

features.name: V27
features.description: SpMax_A: Leading eigenvalue from adjacency matrix (Lovasz-Pelikan index)

features.name: V28
features.description: Psi_i_1d: Intrinsic state pseudoconnectivity index - type 1d

features.name: V29
features.description: B04[C-Br]: Presence/absence of C - Br at topological distance 4

features.name: V30
features.description: SdO: Sum of dO E-states

features.name: V31
features.description: TI2_L: Second Mohar index from Laplace matrix

features.name: V32
features.description: nCrt: Number of ring tertiary C(sp3)

features.name: V34
features.description: F02[C-N]: Frequency of C - N at topological distance 2

features.name: V35
features.description: nHDon: Number of donor atoms for H-bonds (N and O)

features.name: V36
features.description: SpMax_B(m): Leading eigenvalue from Burden matrix weighted by mass

features.name: V37
features.description: Psi_i_A: Intrinsic state pseudoconnectivity index - type S average

features.name: V38
features.description: nN: Number of Nitrogen atoms

features.name: V39
features.description: SM6_B(m): Spectral moment of order 6 from Burden matrix weighted by mass

features.name: V40
features.description: nArCOOR: Number of esters (aromatic)

features.name: V41
features.description: nX: Number of halogen atoms
